{% endraw %} {% raw %}

help_stack[source]

help_stack(func)

The Decorator to be added on top of the function that provides useful insights when an issue occurs in the function

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
@help_stack
def div_by_zero(a):
    return a/0

div_by_zero(12)
{% endraw %}
